text: The Congolese Association Football Federation (; FECOFA) is the governing body of football in the Democratic Republic of the Congo. It organizes the football league Linafoot and the national football team. The association was founded in 1919. It became a member of FIFA in 1962 and CAF in 1963. title: Congolese Association Football Federation
